name: Chocolate Crinkles
description: Baked for the 2010 Serious Eats Cookie Swap "When I was home for Thanksgiving, I copied down a bunch of my mom's cookie recipes. These are one of my sister's favorites." —Rachel Heise Bolten, SE intern...

recipeInstructions.text: Mix sugar, oil, chocolate, and vanilla. Mix in eggs, one at a time. Stir in flour, baking powder, and salt.
Cover and refrigerate at least three hours.
Drop dough by teaspoonfuls into powdered sugar; roll around to coat. Shape into balls. Place on greased cookie sheets, about two inches apart.
Bake until almost no indentation remains when touched (10 to 12 minutes).
